mapper.select: SELECT sit.*, pit.Product_Item_Name as Sales_InMat_Name, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 as Sales_InMat_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type as Sales_InMat_Item_Clsfc_1, dt1.Child_TBL_Type as Sales_InMat_Rcv_Clsfc_Name FROM Sales_InMat_tbl sit INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON sit.Sales_InMat_Code = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt1 ON sit.Sales_InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = dt1.Child_TBL_No WHERE date(sit.Sales_InMat_Date) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY sit.Sales_InMat_Date ASC

SELECT A.Sales_InMat_No, A.Sales_InMat_Lot_No, A.Sales_InMat_Code, C.Product_Item_Name Sales_InMat_Name, B.LM_Qty Sales_InMat_Qty, C.Product_Info_STND_1 Sales_InMat_STND_1, C.Product_Info_STND_2 Sales_InMat_STND_2, A.Sales_InMat_Date, dt.Child_TBL_Type as Sales_InMat_Item_Clsfc_1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type Sales_InMat_Item_Clsfc_2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type Sales_InMat_Item_Material, A.Sales_InMat_Rcv_Clsfc, E.Child_TBL_Type Sales_InMat_Rcv_Clsfc_Name FROM Sales_InMat_tbl A inner join LotMaster_tbl B ON A.Sales_InMat_Lot_No = B.LM_LotNo inner join Product_Info_tbl C ON A.Sales_InMat_Code = C.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL E ON A.Sales_InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = E.Child_TBL_No left outer join DTL_TBL dt on C.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.CHILD_TBL_NO left outer join DTL_TBL dt2 ON C.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt2.Child_TBL_No left outer join DTL_TBL dt3 ON C.Product_Material = dt3.Child_TBL_No where B.LM_Qty > 0
AND B.LM_ItemCode like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
AND B.LM_WareHouse = (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 10 and Child_TBL_Type = '제품창고') AND A.Sales_InMat_Rcv_Clsfc != (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 17 and Child_TBL_Type = '입고반품')
